divs: sighting detailsi (marsha) turned to look out my office window, when i noticed 2 very brightobjects in the blue sky. these 2 objects just seemed to hover around but stayin close proximity to each other. another (3rd) object of the same kind tookoff to the east and hovered there. i am a licensed pilot and witness 3 (lynn)is also a licensed pilot. i called lynn and elizabeth into my office for themto watch also. the objects stayed hovering and slowly moving north\northeastone would float above the other and then come back to being beside it. the 3rdobject we finally lost sight of, but the 2 stayed together in varying proximityto each other until we finally lost them. we all three agreed that they werenothing we had ever seen before. we are an aerospace engineering company andare quite familiar with all sorts of aircraft. this one is a real stumper!!! my office is on the second floor with a clear view of the area we witnessedthese objects.
Summary: Saw 3 shinning star type objects (not stars) in da
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Escondido
There was one other sighting in Escondido on or around April 11th 2002
